sentences.sContent: His two albums released on cassette have sold 10 million copies.
sentences.sCn: 他以磁带形式发行的两张专辑已售出1000万份。

phrases.pCn: 录音带放音机；卡式录音机

trans.tranCn: 盒式磁带；暗盒；珠宝箱；片匣
trans.tranOther: a small flat plastic case containing  magnetic tape  , that can be used for playing or recording sound
